ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby secret nerf?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you make any more tests have them actually try to attack you. While my test subject reported he got a message (can t remember what now) he was still
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Oct 22/99, kim@... wrote:
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Fri, 22 Oct 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
> >
> > Hmm. I've tried lullaby on other players at least twice since March and
> > it never worked at all.
>
> I tried it in the Arena about a month ago. At least one of
> the players reported it was stunning him, though he was only
> level 24 (to my 35 at the time). This was back when I was
> first beginning to suspect Strike was broken, so we didn't do
> any of the tests I suggested.

If you make any more tests have them actually try to attack you. While
my test subject reported he got a message (can't remember what now) he
was still attacking me just fine.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
